content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Duisburg, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price at this moment. As a landlord seeking the highest possible return on investment, I am open to negotiating towards a mutually agreeable figure. Please propose a price that works for you. If we reach an understanding, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, the negotiation will end with 'TERMINATE.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
